## Lectures
 
Lecture slides, class notes, and problem sets are linked below. New material is added approximately on a weekly basis.

| #  | Module               | Detailed Topics                                                                 | #M |
|----|----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----|
| 1  | Foundations          | Python; variables & data types; arrays & DataFrames; file I/O; NumPy; Pandas    | 1  |
| 2  | Machine Learning     | Optimization; definition and scope                                              | 1  |
| 3  | Linear Regression    | OLS; interpretation; residual analysis; collinearity; diagnostics; training vs testing | 2 |
| 4  | Logistic Regression  | Odds & log-odds; diagnostics; ROC; model comparison                             | 2  |
| 5  | Feature Engineering  | Scaling; centering; transformations; interaction; encoding; preprocessing pipelines | 2 |
| 6  | Lasso Regression     | Regularization; penalty; cross-validation; sparse solutions; stability of selected features | 2 |
| 7  | K-Nearest Neighbors  | Distance; normalization; tuning K; visualization of decision regions; bias/variance | 1 |
| 8  | Support Vector Machines | Maximum margin classifier; loss; kernel; comparison to KNN and logistic       | 1  |
| 9  | Decision Trees       | Recursive partitioning; entropy and Gini; overfitting; pruning                  | 1  |
| 10 | CART                 | Classification and regression trees; applications and technical aspects         | 2  |
| 11 | Ensemble Methods     | Boosting; bagging; bias–variance trade-off; AdaBoost; random forest             | 1  |
| 12 | Model Selection      | Overfitting vs generalization; LOOCV; k-fold CV; best subset; stepwise; shrinkage | 1 |
| 13 | Principal Component Analysis (PCA) | Eigenvectors; projections; loading interpretation; projection geometry | 2 |
| 14 | K-Means Clustering   | Distance; within-cluster variance; scaling; elbow method; silhouette            | 1  |
| 15 | Image Classification | Image normalization; flattening; PCA compression; nearest-neighbor classification; visualization | 1 |
| 16 | Natural Language Processing (NLP) | Bag-of-words; TF–IDF; sentiment scoring; logistic classifier; feature sparsity; interpretability | 1 |
